title: Electric field near circular sheet of charge

content.description: The figure above shows a thin, circular nonconducting sheet of positive charge uniformly distributed over its area. The radius of the sheet is R. Point O is at the center of the sheet. Point S is a distance x from the center of the sheet, and point T is a distance 4x from the center of the sheet. Assume R ≫ x.
content.question: If the magnitude of the electric field at point T is ET , which of the following best represents the magnitude of the electric field at point S ?

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
